author: Staff Reporter
text:
A section of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) workers attached to the Thenimalai depot here resorted to a demonstration on Tuesday, The workers complained about lack of several amenities for the workers in the depot.

After merger

After two TNSTC depots on the Thandarampattu Road were merged into one, some of the amenities such as a rest room and dormitory for the crew operating the night services were not sufficient, they said.

Though the issue was raised with authorities several times the demands were not heeded the protesters added.
title: TNSTC workers stage demonstration
